feed.title: Google Cloud: API Gateway
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: API Gateway

entry.content: On July 23, 2025, we released an updated version of API Gateway.
entry.title: Announcement: API Gateway Update

entry.content:
Deprecation of Transport Layer Security (TLS) v1.0 and v1.1 protocols

API Gateway now enforces TLS v1.2+. You can opt out of enforcing TLS v1.2+ for your API Gateway's new security settings by reaching out to Google Cloud Support to continue using your current protocol.
entry.summary: API Gateway now enforces TLS v1.2+.
entry.title: Deprecated: Deprecation of TLS v1.0 and v1.1

entry.content: On June 9, 2025, we released an updated version of API Gateway.
entry.summary: An updated version of API Gateway was released on June 9, 2025.
entry.title: Announcement: API Gateway Update

entry.content:
With this release, the limit on the number of API gateways that can be created per region is increased to 50.

For more information, see Quotas and limits
entry.summary: The limit for API gateways per region has been increased to 50.
entry.title: Feature: API Gateway limit increased
